long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is a helping hand for all users selling CS2 items on GamerPay.

Once a user has purchased one of more items from you, you can use this extension to auto-fill such item(s) in the Steam trade offer window, making the selling experience much smoother!

Features:
- Auto-fill items to the Steam trade offer
- Fetch your full CS2 inventory to GamerPay incl tradelocked items

-----
Please report issues using either:
- Email:  support@gamerpay.gg
- Discord channel:  https://discord.com/invite/gamerpay-796302096243621929


*This extension is built upon the open-source foundation provided by CSFloat.
We extend our gratitude to the CSFloat team for their invaluable work and contribution.
